citation: Proclamation under the Firearms (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2015 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Firearms (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2015

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Firearms (Miscellaneous Amendments) Act 2015 fix 17 August 2016 as the day on which sections 7, 9, 10, 11, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 20, 23, 24, 25, 26, 28, 29, 30, 31, 34, 39, 46, 56, 58, 59 and 62 of that Act commence.

8 August 2016

C. WARNER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

M. T. (RENE) HIDDING

Minister for Police, Fire and Emergency Management

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 17 August 2016

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Police, Fire and Emergency Management.
